abstract: Some ambitious projects in sensor research offer a glimpse of where this fledgling field may be headed.
snippet: Some ambitious projects in sensor research offer a glimpse of where this fledgling field may be headed.
lead_paragraph: In computing, the vision always precedes the reality by a decade or more. The pattern has held true from the personal computer to the Internet, as it takes time, brainpower and investment to conquer the scientific and economic obstacles to nudging a game-changing technology toward the mainstream.

headline.main: Smart Dust? Not Quite, but We’re Getting There
headline.print_headline: Smart Dust? Not Quite, but We’re Getting There
